* '''November 19, 2007:''' The ''V World Forum on Free Knowledge'' in Puerto Ord√°z 
The mission of the World Forum on Free Knowledge is:
Consolidate Venezuela as an international benchmark in the area of free knowledge. Share national and international experiences in implementing initiatives liberation of knowledge. Promote national human resources opening opportunities for participation of local talent.

Establish and strengthen relations between Venezuela and the international community who share common interests liberation of knowledge.

Open spaces for organized communities, private enterprise and the national government in which they can learn and benefit from national and international initiatives related to the free knowledge.
